modName: Dragonboner semi-transparent armour proof of concept
descriptionHtml:
Just a prrof of concept, i know it looks like arse. :P

method used

open dragonbonearmorf_0.nif in nifscope(make sure you have the latest version of nif.xml)
open a new window and load femalebody_0.nif

in nifscope dragonbonearmorf_0.nif delete the clipped body block and copy/paste the astridbody block from femalebody_0.nif

(see http://cs.elderscrolls.com/constwiki/index.php/Making_New_Armor_Using_NifSkope if you need help)
open the NIAlphaProperty in the armor and right click flags, tick the enable blending box 
in NIAlphaProperty set the threshold to 0

edit the texture file for the armour and mess with the alpha.

this contains portions of Underwear Texture Replacement Mod by Sarahb360 and files from bethsoft
first post so i dont know much about the permissions thing as far as bethsoft goes(but seeing as how loads of users are uploading modified bethsoft files it must be ok, if not remove this)
author: Zuluknob

files.name: The nif xml that works with skyrim files
